io.netty.channel

Interface ChannelStateHandler

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ChannelHandler
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ChannelInboundByteHandler, io.netty.channel.ChannelInboundHandler, ChannelInboundMessageHandler<I>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractTrafficShapingHandler, Base64Decoder, ByteArrayDecoder, ByteLoggingHandler, ByteToByteCodec, ByteToByteDecoder, ByteToMessageCodec, ByteToMessageDecoder, ChannelDuplexHandler, ChannelInboundByteHandlerAdapter, ChannelInboundMessageHandlerAdapter, ChannelInitializer, ChannelStateHandlerAdapter, ChannelTrafficShapingHandler, ChunkedWriteHandler, CombinedChannelDuplexHandler, CompatibleMarshallingDecoder, DelimiterBasedFrameDecoder, FixedLengthFrameDecoder, GlobalTrafficShapingHandler, HttpClientCodec, HttpContentCompressor, HttpContentDecoder, HttpContentDecompressor, HttpContentEncoder, HttpObjectAggregator, HttpObjectDecoder, HttpRequestDecoder, HttpResponseDecoder, HttpServerCodec, IdleStateHandler, JZlibDecoder, LengthFieldBasedFrameDecoder, LineBasedFrameDecoder, LoggingHandler, MarshallingDecoder, MessageLoggingHandler, MessageToMessageCodec, MessageToMessageDecoder, ObjectDecoder, ProtobufDecoder, ProtobufVarint32FrameDecoder, ReadTimeoutHandler, ReplayingDecoder, RtspObjectDecoder, RtspRequestDecoder, RtspResponseDecoder, SctpInboundByteStreamHandler, SctpMessageCompletionHandler, SctpMessageToMessageDecoder, SnappyFramedDecoder, SocksAuthRequestDecoder, SocksAuthResponseDecoder, SocksCmdRequestDecoder, SocksCmdResponseDecoder, SocksInitRequestDecoder, SocksInitResponseDecoder, SpdyFrameCodec, SpdyFrameDecoder, SpdyHttpCodec, SpdyHttpDecoder, SpdyHttpResponseStreamIdHandler, SpdyOrHttpChooser, SpdySessionHandler, SslHandler, StringDecoder, WebSocket00FrameDecoder, WebSocket07FrameDecoder, WebSocket08FrameDecoder, WebSocket13FrameDecoder, WebSocketServerProtocolHandler, WebSocketServerProtocolHandshakeHandler, ZlibDecoder

    public interface ChannelStateHandler
extends ChannelHandler
    ChannelHandler which adds callbacks for state changes. This allows the user to hook in to state changes easily.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface io.netty.channel.ChannelHandler

        ChannelHandler.Sharable

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void channelActive(ChannelHandlerContext ctx)
      The Channel of the ChannelHandlerContext is now active
      void channelInactive(ChannelHandlerContext ctx)
      The Channel of the ChannelHandlerContext was registered is now inactive and reached its end of lifetime.
      void channelReadSuspended(ChannelHandlerContext ctx)
      Invoked when a ChannelOutboundInvoker.read() is finished and the inbound buffer of this handler will not be updated until another ChannelOutboundInvoker.read() request is issued.
      void channelRegistered(ChannelHandlerContext ctx)
      The Channel of the ChannelHandlerContext was registered with its EventLoop
      void channelUnregistered(ChannelHandlerContext ctx)
      The Channel of the ChannelHandlerContext was unregistered from its EventLoop
      void inboundBufferUpdated(ChannelHandlerContext ctx)
      The inbound buffer of the ChannelHandlerContext was updated with new data.

      • Methods inherited from interface io.netty.channel.ChannelHandler

        afterAdd, afterRemove, beforeAdd, beforeRemove, exceptionCaught, userEventTriggered

      • channelReadSuspended

        void channelReadSuspended(ChannelHandlerContext ctx)
                          throws Exception
        Invoked when a ChannelOutboundInvoker.read() is finished and the inbound buffer of this handler will not be updated until another ChannelOutboundInvoker.read() request is issued.
        Throws:
        Exception

      • inboundBufferUpdated

        void inboundBufferUpdated(ChannelHandlerContext ctx)
                          throws Exception
        The inbound buffer of the ChannelHandlerContext was updated with new data. This means something may be ready to get processed by the actual ChannelStateHandler implementation. It's up to the implementation to consume it or keep it in the buffer to wait for more data and consume it later.
        Throws:
        Exception
